caption:
We’re celebrating National Pet Month with a major giveaway. Just show off your camera-ready buddy for a shot at a year’s worth of BLUE Life Protection Formula or Tastefuls!​⁣
⁣
👍 Like this post ​​⁣
👉 Make sure you’re following @bluebuffalo​​⁣
📸 Share a pic or video of your pet, tag @bluebuffalo, and use #BLUEForAYear​⁣
⁣
Must be 18 years or older to enter. No purchase necessary. U.S. residents only (No P.O. Boxes). Giveaway will be closed on 5/31/25. 2 winner(s) will be randomly selected and contacted via @bluebuffalo’s official account. Giveaway is not sponsored or endorsed by Facebook, Instagram, or X.​
